name: carriera
title: Carriera
desc: The minimal job board for high-growth teams.
article:
Carriera is a Swiss-inspired job board template built for clarity, scale, and credibility. With flexible theming, structured layouts, and fast performance.


  • Learn more about Carbon
  • Get the full access bundle including all premium themes and lifetime access: https://lexingtonthemes.com/

All Pages

  • Landing Page
  • About
  • Pricing
  • Team (CC)
  • Blog (CC)
  • Companies (CC)
  • Jobs board (CC)
  • Candidates (CC)
  • Help center (CC)
  • Legal pages (CC)
  • Reset password
  • Submit job
  • Submit company
  • Submit job offer
  • Contact
  • Sign in
  • Sign up
  • Error 404


(CC) = Content Collections

Features

  • Light, dark and purple mode
  • Job board paywall
  • Blog Tags
  • Reusable components
  • Search powered with Fuse JS
  • Content collections
  • Seo Optimized
  • Ongoing updates
  • Style guide
  • Astro RSS
  • Astro SEO
  • Astro Sitemap
  • Tailwind CSS Forms
  • Tailwind Typography
